SELECT bp.name, CASE WHEN bp.sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN bp.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bp.birthday,CURDATE()) as age, hd.dname, bd.disease, bo.create_time as outpatientTime, tm.hisname as tsName, bpia.quantity, bpia.treatment_quantity, bo.create_time as outpatient_time, bpit.cure_start_time, bpit.id as prescriptionItemTaskId, bpit.patient_id, bpit.outpatient_id, bpit.entity_id, bpit.cure_user_id, bpit.registrant_id, bpit.department_id, bpit.customer_id FROM bu_prescription_item_task bpit LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bpit.patient_id = bp.his_id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_department hd ON bpit.department_id = hd.his_id AND hd.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_outpatient bo ON bpit.outpatient_id = bo.his_id AND bo.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_diagnose bd ON bpit.patient_id = bd.patient_id and bpit.outpatient_id = bd.outpatient_id and bpit.customer_id = bd.customer_id AND bd.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_prescription_item_appointment bpia ON bpit.prescription_item_appointment_id = bpia.id AND bpia.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN treatment_mapping tm ON bpit.entity_id = tm.hiscode and bpit.customer_id = tm.customer_id WHERE bpit.is_del = 0 AND bpit.cure_status = 2
AND (bp.name LIKE concat('%',#{itemTaskRo.search},'%') OR bp.phone LIKE concat('%',#{itemTaskRo.search},'%'))
AND bpit.department_id = #{itemTaskRo.departmentId}
AND (bo.create_time between #{itemTaskRo.startDate} AND #{itemTaskRo.endDate})
ORDER BY bpit.cure_status,bpit.signature_time DESC

SELECT bp.name, bp.phone, CASE WHEN bp.sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN bp.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bp.birthday,CURDATE()) as age, bd.disease, bd.syndrome, bo.create_time as outpatient_time, bpit.ts_name, ss.detail, bpit.disease_id, bpit.customer_id, bpit.id as prescriptionItemTaskId, bpit.prescription_id, bpit.patient_id, bpit.outpatient_id, bpit.entity_id, bpit.cure_user_id, bpit.registrant_id, bpit.create_time, bpit.cure_status, bpit.cure_start_time, hu.user_name AS cureUserName, hu1.user_name AS registrantName FROM bu_prescription_item_task bpit LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bpit.patient_id = bp.his_id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_outpatient bo ON bpit.outpatient_id = bo.his_id AND bo.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_diagnose bd on bpit.patient_id = bd.patient_id and bpit.outpatient_id = bd.outpatient_id and bpit.customer_id = bd.customer_id LEFT JOIN treatment_mapping tm ON bpit.entity_id = tm.hiscode and bpit.customer_id = tm.customer_id AND tm.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN sch_sytech ss ON tm.code = ss.sytech_id AND bd.disease_id = ss.disease_id AND bd.syndrome_id = ss.syndrome_id AND ss.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_user hu ON bpit.cure_user_id = hu.id AND hu.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_user hu1 ON bpit.registrant_id = hu1.id AND hu1.is_del = 0 WHERE bpit.is_del = 0 and bpit.id = #{id}

SELECT temp1.* FROM ( SELECT temp.id, temp.patient_id, temp.outpatient_id, temp.customer_id, temp.entity_id, temp.phone, temp.name, temp.ts_name, temp.customerName, bpit1.appointment_date, bpit1.time_slot, temp.dname FROM ( SELECT bpit.id, bpit.patient_id, bpit.outpatient_id, bpit.customer_id, bpit.entity_id, bpit.ts_name, ms.name AS customerName, bp.phone, bp.name, hd.dname FROM bu_prescription_item_task bpit LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bpit.patient_id = bp.his_id and bpit.customer_id = bp.customer_id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ms_customer ms ON bpit.customer_id = ms.id AND ms.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_department hd ON bpit.department_id = hd.his_id AND bpit.customer_id = hd.customer_id AND hd.is_del = 0 WHERE bpit.is_del = 0 AND bpit.appointment_status = 1 AND (bpit.appointment_create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) GROUP BY bpit.customer_id, bpit.patient_id, bpit.entity_id ) temp LEFT JOIN bu_prescription_item_task bpit1 ON temp.customer_id = bpit1.customer_id AND temp.patient_id = bpit1.patient_id AND temp.outpatient_id = bpit1.outpatient_id AND temp.entity_id = bpit1.entity_id AND temp.customer_id = bpit1.customer_id WHERE bpit1.is_del = 0 AND bpit1.appointment_status = 1 ORDER BY bpit1.appointment_date ASC, bpit1.time_slot ASC limit 999999999 ) temp1 GROUP BY id,entity_id

SELECT bpit.id, bpit.patient_id, bpit.outpatient_id, bpit.customer_id, bpit.entity_id, bpit.ts_name, ms.name AS customerName, bp.phone, bp.name, hd.dname FROM bu_prescription_item_task bpit LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bpit.patient_id = bp.his_id AND bpit.customer_id = bp.customer_id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ms_customer ms ON bpit.customer_id = ms.id AND ms.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_department hd ON bpit.department_id = hd.his_id AND bpit.customer_id = hd.customer_id AND hd.is_del = 0 WHERE bpit.is_del = 0 AND bpit.appointment_status = 1 AND bpit.cure_status = 0 AND (bpit.appointment_create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
SELECT * FROM bu_prescription_item_task WHERE is_del = 0 AND appointment_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND appointment_status = 1 AND ( signature_status = 0 OR cure_status = 0)
